price: (Nkͻmhyεni), wobɛtumi ama ͻsosifoͻ ate asεm, anaa watene onifrani a ͻwͻ yera mu kͻ akyirikyi paa no?
arabic: أَفَأَنتَ تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ أَوۡ تَهۡدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيَ وَمَن كَانَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: afa-anta tus'miʿu al-ṣuma aw tahdī al-ʿum'ya waman kāna fī ḍalālin mubīnin
